subject: Sales
title: Bias Runs Every Deal
description: A 60-second lesson on Bias Runs Every Deal.

hook.text: You think you make rational buying decisions. You don't. Neither does anyone else on Earth.

buildup.text: Cognitive biases are shortcuts baked into every human brain. They save energy but warp judgment.

discovery.text: Researchers have cataloged over 180 biases. Salespeople only need to master about a dozen.

twist.text: Knowing about biases doesn't make you immune. Even psychologists fall for them when shopping.

climax.text: The best sellers don't exploit biases. They recognize them and remove friction from decisions.

punchline.text: Every deal runs on shortcuts the buyer can't see.

quiz.question: Roughly how many cognitive biases have researchers cataloged?
